overview: Pigs are animals that we think we know well. But how we perceive them is sometimes far from reality. After all, pigs are extremely intelligent and sensitive, and they even share much more with humans than just basic genetic traits. Get to know five pigs and follow their lives from birth to adulthood.
tagline: One fine day, a piglet is born on an American farm. A life as a pet awaits him, much different from his wild cousins ​​in Laos. How have the pig's instincts survived millennia of domestication...?
title: 5 Little Pigs
